content: Lionel Messi is a football/soccer superstar known for his incredible skills and numerous records in the sport. He's a legend!
Cristiano Ronaldo is another football/soccer superstar known for his speed, power, and incredible goal-scoring abilities. He's a legend too!
And do you know who I am? Stop.
Of course I know who you are! You are the one and only fabulous, extraordinary, amazing...uh oh, I forgot!
Glad I could make you laugh! If you need anything else, just let me know. Have a great day!
